widgetsBundle.title: Charts
widgetsBundle.description: Display timeseries data using customizable line and bar charts. Use various pie charts to display latest values.

widgetTypes.name: Bars
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities as separate bars.

widgetTypes.name: Doughnut
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities in a doughnut chart. Supports numeric values only.

widgetTypes.name: Pie - Flot
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities in a pie chart. Supports numeric values only.

widgetTypes.name: Pie - Chart.js
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities in a pie chart. Supports numeric values only.

widgetTypes.name: Polar Area
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities in a polar area chart. Supports numeric values only.

widgetTypes.name: Radar
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest values of the attributes or timeseries data for multiple entities in a radar chart. Supports numeric values only.

widgetTypes.name: State Chart
widgetTypes.description: Displays changes to the state of the entity over time. For example, online and offline.

widgetTypes.name: Timeseries Line Chart
widgetTypes.description: Displays changes to timeseries data over time. For example, temperature or humidity readings.

widgetTypes.name: Timeseries Bar Chart
widgetTypes.description: Displays changes to timeseries data over time. For example, daily water consumption for last month.
